Uses of Class
org.jogger.Route

Packages that use Route
org.jogger Entry point classes (such as Jogger and JoggerServer) used to configure and run a web application. 
org.jogger.routes Provides classes to load routes using different mechanisms (from a file or using annotations). 
org.jogger.test The testing infrastructure for Jogger applications. 
 

Uses of Route in org.jogger
 

Methods in org.jogger that return Route
 Route Jogger.getRoute(String httpMethod, String path)
          Retrieves the Route that matches the specified httpMethod and path.

Methods in org.jogger with parameters of type Route

          Adds a route to the list of routes using a Route object.
 void RouteRequestExecutor.execute(Route route, Request request, Response response)
          Calls the interceptors and the controller action for the specified route.
